basic.description:
An introduction to some of the major themes in the social, cultural, economic and political history of Canada.
LEARNING HOURS    260 (144O;120P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Canada from the Conquest to the Present

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above (24 units completed or in progress)
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 260/6.0; HIST 278/3.0, HIST 279/3.0.	
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from HIST 260/6.0; HIST 269/3.0
